attributes.action: UK's publicly funded Museums must close down there Ivory collection galleries.
attributes.background:
Liverpool Museum Ivory collection is one of largest in the UK alongside those of the Victoria & Albert and British Museums.
By stating it  celebrates art and antiques thus making Ivory a desirable commodity, fueling modern day trade in Ivory.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for the museums to take, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law to ban the display of ivory in museums.
